name: Coloring The Life
description:
Controls: 

  • A,D (Move)
  • W (Jump)
  • Left Click (Shoot)
  • R (Restart)

-------------------

Coloring the Life

Try to reach the color to complete rainbow. Use shrink weapon to clear your path. You have limited bullets.

This game made for Trijam#126 in 2 hours 58 mins

Developers:

Okan Seref (okanseref) & Murat Can Unal (avanar123)

All assets were made by us except sounds

Sounds: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/game/
